pr_title: #18147 now when adding a fields, the data type is added. Unit test al…

timeline.message: #18147 now when adding a fields, the data type is added. Unit test also added. and a fix for the Contentlet structureInode refactor field

timeline.author: wezell

timeline.bodyText: Why include these changes?  I would rather have it called contentTypeId in our pojo
timeline.author: wezell

replies.bodyText: in a previous commit the structureInode was rename to contentTypeId, them we realized it is breaking the starter (importer), so doing the fix
replies.author: jdotcms

timeline.bodyText: If this is not going to be used anymore, remove the code completely.
timeline.author: jcastro-dotcms

timeline.bodyText:
A few things here:

Since we are testing the MoveFieldsForm this test should live in a new test class class MoveFieldFormsTest
Test method naming convention usually includes the method we are testing. In this case getRows. Suggested method name: testGetRows_givenFieldsinJSON_ShouldDeserializeRespectingOrderAndDatatypes
Javadoc should also say that we are testing that the proper datatypes are kept after de-serialization
timeline.author: dsilvam

replies.bodyText:
Not sure if should live in a diff class.
Ok the rest of the points
replies.author: jdotcms
